title: Short of options, Gazans try to flee Rafah ahead of Israeli operation
description: The Washington Post spoke to several Gazans in Rafah who said they were trying to head north to Gaza’s central region amid the threat of an Israeli operation.

title: Russian court sentences sociologist to five years for criticizing war
description: The sociologist, Boris Kagarlitsky, initially was ordered to pay a fine but now faces jail. Russian authorities said they also want to arrest Estonia’s prime minister.

title: Global military spending hits record $2.2 trillion amid multiple wars
description: NATO member states are part of a global military spending spree in 2023, according to the International Institute for Strategic Studies.

title: Who is Prabowo, the former general who could win Indonesia’s election?
description: Indonesians are voting to replace President Joko Widodo in what is shaping up to be a test of the strength of democracy in the world’s fourth-most populous nation.

title: ‘Duo euthanasia’: In the Netherlands, a famous couple chooses to die together
description: Former prime minister Dries van Agt and his wife, Eugenie, are among a growing number of Dutch couples electing to legally end their lives together.

title: Middle East conflict live updates: Biden urges civilian safety plan in Rafah as Jordan’s king calls for cease-fire
description: At a joint news conference with the president, King Abdullah II said an Israeli operation in Rafah was sure to lead to “another humanitarian catastrophe.”

title: Venice likes a good party, just not the crowds
description: The ancient city is hosting its last Carnival festivities before starting to charge an entrance fee to combat overtourism.

title: As Trump spooks Europe, Biden stirs global anger over Gaza war
description: To critics in the West, Donald Trump is an existential threat to NATO and its political ethos. But President Biden, to critics in the Global South, is seen as complicit in Israel’s relentless war in Gaza.

title: Republicans sidestep criticizing Trump’s attack on NATO
description: The former president’s remarks on not defending NATO allies against Russia were met with a mixture of pushback, defensiveness and silence on Capitol Hill.
